content.text:
Wilbur, K., ed. 1982. The Holographic Paradigm and Other Paradoxes. Boulder, Colo.: Shambhala Publications.
Wilson, B. R., ed. 1970. Rationality. Oxford: Blackwell.
Winch, P. 1964. “Understanding a Primitive Society.” American Philosophical Quarterly. Reprinted in Rationality, edited by B. R. Wilson.
Wintrob, R. M. 1969. “An Inward Focus: A Consideration of Psychological Stress on Fieldwork.” In Stress and Response in Fieldwork, edited by F. Henry and S. Saberwal.
Wiredu, K. 1980. Philosophy and an African Culture. Cambridge: Cambridge University Press.
Wittgenstein, L. 1958. Philosophical Investigations. Oxford: Blackwell.
———. 1978. Remarks on the Foundations of Mathematics. Oxford: Blackwell.
Wolfson, H. 1947. Philo. 2 vols. Cambridge: Harvard University Press.
Wulfeck, B. B., J. Juarez, E. A. Bates, and K. Kilborn. 1986. “Sentence Interpretation Strategies in Healthy and Aphasic Bilingual Adults.” In Language Processing in Bilinguals: Psycholinguistic and Neuropsychological Perspectives, edited by J. Vaid.
Wurm, S. A. 1977. “Summary of Discussion.” In Language and Thought, edited by W. C. McCormack and S. A. Wurm.
Yang, C. K. 1967. Religion in Chinese Society. Berkeley: University of California Press.
